definition[0]: a painted picture that you put on a wall for people to see
example[1]: Can you help me hang this painting  (=put it on a wall)?
example[2]: There was a large painting of his father on the wall.
definition[1]: the act or skill of making a picture, using paints
example[4]: the Cubist school of painting  (=a particular style used by a group of people)
definition[2]: the work of covering a wall, house etc with paint
